data.name: Shoot Your Friends
data.detailed_description:
Shoot Your Friends is a love letter to retro deathmatch gaming. We all have that friend we want to shoot (in a loving kind of way) and now you finally can. So grab a buddy - or heck, bring up to three - and get to it!

This is My Rifle, This is My Gun

Sure, plenty of games let you shoot your friends with any old gun. But what if you had eight different guns to shoot your friends with? Think of the possibilities (there are eight possibilities)!

Rules to Shoot By

While you can't go wrong with shooting your friends, sometimes you just need to spice things up. Shoot Your Friends features eight different game modes that allow you to jazz up the act of homicide. But remember, if any mode is too complicated, you can't go wrong by just shooting your friends!

Remember Who Your Buddy Is

Some friends are for shooting, but other friends are for keeping around. All game modes are designed to be team-play compatible. Simply pick the same team colour when choosing your weapons, and together you and your friend can shoot your friends!

Take the Scenic Route

For some people, stage 1-1 is all they need in life. But not you. You're a world traveller. You don't want to shoot your friends in a boring locale day in and day out. You want to feel the wind in your hair, while cruising past breathtaking vistas and taking in stunning sights. We don't really do the breathtaking vistas thing, but we can offer you ten different arenas to shoot your friends in!

data.short_description: Shoot Your Friends is not just a command, but is also a fast-paced couch shooter for 2-4 pals. It's never been easier to blast your buddies with a handful of staple guns and exotic game modes. Also, you're a tank.
data.reviews:
“I just think it's neat. Also grab some milk on your way home.”
Mom

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 or greater
  • Processor: AMD A6-3600 series or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
  • Additional Notes: 2-4 XInput gamepads
